a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Percent of men and women using social media platforms in the US, 2019
Estimates correspond to US adults who say they ever use these online platforms or apps. Bubble sizes are
proportional to the total number of users of each platform.
Source: Pew Research Center (2019), Users by social media platform, Statista and TNW (2019)
